title: Petition to make a 20 minute permanent gamemode
body: say you have to leave in 30min to a hour and still want to play a game, why not create a game more where at 20 minutes the game ends at the team/ player with the most points wins.

The miscommunication is caused by you ignoring the original purpose of the thread. FirstTimer's point is: if you want to talk about averages, they better not be calculated from wide distributions. An average time of 20 minutes is meaningless if you only have 20 minutes tops. The OP NEEDS a guaranteed constant time of 20 minutes or less.

Barring that, yes, his queue time claims are weird. Usually it's like a minute or two for both 3s and Dom. But I have on occasion seen HUGE queue times for Dominion at offball hours. Maybe he just queues at those times.
Yea again, all they can do is estimate the average time, so again we already HAVE modes that are meant for shorter amounts of time.

Unless they create a mode where the game ends at precisely 20 minutes and scores are tallied. Is the fact that this thread is for a new game mode just not coming across? Yes, all they can do for current game modes is estimate. NO ONE'S TALKING ABOUT CURRENT GAME MODES, because they don't address the problem.
